entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [HTTP/3] Should QuicConnection.Dispose abort? #60235
  • Error in CI `Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release` #60234
  • Investigate ways to reduce overhead of the hardware intrinsics test matrix #60233
    7.0.0
  • [arm64] Volatile is 2x faster then "volatile" #60232
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add [Try]Parse to Rune #60231
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: FileInfo.NameWithoutExtension #60227
    Future
  • XmlTextReaderImpl.Read() significant performance regression in net6.0 #60226

Closed

  • TimeZoneNotFoundException: The time zone ID 'America/Chicago' was not found on the local computer. #60175
  • .net core 5 console app crashes #58172
    Future
  • Runtime dependency resolution #38080
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add API entry for JsonDocument converter #60236
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Unify set-reg-to-imm functions and optimize with LEA at runtime on x64 #60228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for profiler inlining #60225
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [mono][interp] Avoid calls to m_class_get_mem_manager () in get_virtu… #60229
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add support for non-seekable files to RandomAccess #58506
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [draft fix for 43752] Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Sort oper allocation counts table #60223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
